heading: Today
text: Some early clouds, snow showers northeast, then mostly sunny.
temperature: 8 to 15 north, 20 to 25 south, steady or falling.

heading: Monday Night
temperature: 0 to 10 below, teens below in cold spots

heading: Tuesday
text: Sun giving way to increasing clouds.

heading: Wednesday
text: Snow, mixing with afternoon rain south, and western valleys.
